original_text: I carefully explained my laws to my people. But they do not accept my laws as their own. I carefully explained my laws to my people. But they do not accept my laws as their own. I carefully explained my laws to my people. But they do not accept my laws as their own. I carefully explained my laws to my people. But they do not accept my laws as their own. I carefully explained my laws to my people.
korean_text: 내가 그를 위하여 내 율법을 만 가지로 기록하였으나 그들은 이상한 것으로 여기도다

sentences.original_text: I carefully explained my laws to my people.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나의 백성에게 나의 율법을 신중하게 설명했다.

sentences.original_text: But they do not accept my laws as their own.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 나의 율법을 자신의 것으로 받아들이지 않는다.

sentences.original_text: I carefully explained my laws to my people.
